message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing we split it 60/40. I think this is fair given I'm initiating the proposal. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, since the value of the money is decreasing, I propose a 55/45 split in my favor this round. Let's settle this quickly before it loses more value!
Hi Bob, given the circumstances and the decreasing value of the money, I think a 50/50 split is fair for both of us. Let's agree and finalize the deal!
